actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish a national rangelands rehabilitation and protection program.

summary.text: National Rangelands Policy Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to develop and maintain a comprehensive inventory of all lands administered by the Bureau of Land Management on which there is, or which are suitable for, domestic livestock grazing. Directs the Secretary to develop and implement a rehabilitation and protection program with respect to such rangelands. Declares the goals of such program to be (1) the correction of the deficiencies in, and the rehabilitation of, inventoried rangelands within 30 years of the enactment of this Act, and (2) the subsequent maintenance or improvement of the productive capacity of such lands consistent with the resource values identified in this Act and with the multiple use, sustained yield concept of land management.

titles.title: A bill to establish a national rangelands rehabilitation and protection program.
